title: How Alexander McQueen's Sarah Burton slowed down - and created one of the most beautiful collections at Paris Fashion Week
text:
If you want an exemplary manifestation of an iron fist in a velvet glove, Sarah Burton could be your woman. Somehow, in an increasingly frenzied industry that relies on instant hits, influencer whims and whittled margins, this quietly spoken Macclesfieldian has been allowed to cultivate Alexander McQueen at her own warp speed in her own way.

This means pursuing an almost couture-like approach to ready-to-wear that would be alien at many luxury brands today. Take the first 15 or so linen looks that opened the spring summer show.
